Summary A high-energy resourceful Executive Assistant/Office Manager with extensive experience in providing top-notch administrative support to busy physicians and faculty members. Detail oriented with outstanding organizational skills and multi-tasking abilities. Exercises sound judgment in managing workload and is extremely successful at accomplishing a variety of tasks with multiple priorities at one time. Flexible and adapts to changing goals with ease and tackles new challenges with enthusiasm. Self-starter with a proven track record in project management and problem resolution. Able to build productive relationships, resolve complex issues and diffuse difficult situations with tact and ease. A team player with a can-do-attitude who does whatever it takes to get the job done in a friendly efficient manner.
